EmailTemplate.name: DuPont™ Nomex® New
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
DuPont Protection Technologies values our relationship with you and appreciates your continued use of DuPont products in the solutions you provide to help protect people.
For this reason, we are looking for feedback on additional deniers in Nomex® filament products. Currently our technical team is investigating the market possibilities for a 400 denier and 800 denier Nomex(R) type 430 (natural).
Please let me know if your company would have an interest the 400 denier or 800 denier Nomex®. Could these new denier open up new business opportunities that the 200d, 1200d or 1600d could not provide?
Any feedback is helpful. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you.
Sincerely, Beth L Taylor ________________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Technologies Account Manager DuPont™ Nomex®/ DuPont™ Kevlar® 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway • Richmond VA 23234 Phone: (877) 713 -1299 or 804-383-2194 beth.l.taylor@dupont.comPatricia Humble
